workshop.title: Big Data Journey: New Data Lake
workshop.description: This workshop will show you how to build your New Data Lake in the Oracle Public Cloud.

labs.title: Lab 100: START HERE - Provisioning
labs.description: Instructions to provision Oracle Big Data Cloud Service - Compute Edition (BDCS-CE) in your Oracle Public Cloud identity domain

labs.title: Lab 200: Getting to know BDCS-CE
labs.description: This lab will help you get to know BDCS-CE.  It will use the Notebook component and show you how to use the basic features (object store, hive) you'll need as you build your New Data Lake.

labs.title: Lab 300: More BDCS-CE
labs.description: This lab will help you get to know more BDCS-CE.  It will use the Notebook component and show you how to use the more key features (spark, spark sql) you'll need as you build your New Data Lake.

labs.title: Lab 400: OEHCS Provisioning
labs.description: Instructions to provision Oracle Event Hub Cloud Service

labs.title: Lab 500: Working with OEHCS and BDCS-CE
labs.description: This lab will help you get to know Oracle Event Hub Cloud Service (OEHCS).  It will use the Zeppelin notebook and Spark Streaming from your BDCS-CE instance and show you how to write consumers and producers for OEHCS.

labs.title: xtra: $300 Trial Account Signup
labs.description: Instructions to sign-up for a free trial of Oracle Public Cloud services

labs.title: xtra: Employee GSE Account Request
labs.description: Oracle Employee instructions to get access to a GSE/demo.oracle.com Oracle Public Cloud demo environment

labs.title: Cleanup
labs.description: Instructions to cleanup your cloud service environment.
